Name: Greyhound's Tooth
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh grapefruit flavours form the backbone of this summer-fresh cocktail.
History: Created in 2010 by Brandon Clements, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Greyhound's Tooth contains 182 calories
